attributes.action: stop poisoning our future generations with toxic waste and invest in clean renewable energy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We petition the prime minister to cease all future plans for nuclear power plants and invest in clean, renewable energy such as wave, wind, solar and geothermal. Please do not poison our grandchildren with the selfishness of toxic waste.

rejection.details:
There are lots of petitions on this topic:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=renewable+energy
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
